articles.description: Latest football news as Bayern Munich draw with Real Madrid in the Champions League semi-final, and Ipswich beat Coventry in the Championship.
articles.title: Latest football news: Reaction to Bayern draw with Real & Ipswich win

articles.description: Red Bull confirm their design chief Adrian Newey will leave the team in 2025.
articles.title: Red Bull confirm designer Adrian Newey exit

articles.description: Harry Kane reveals that Jude Bellingham said "you're going to go left of the keeper" after the Real Madrid star tried to put his England team-mate off while taking a penalty.
articles.title: Jude Bellingham & Harry Kane's conversation before Bayern penalty

articles.description: Tyrese Maxey scores 46 points as the Philadelphia 76ers stun the New York Knicks 112-106 to keep their play-off hopes alive.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Tyrese Maxey stars as Philadelphia 76ers stun New York Knicks

articles.description: It is 30 years since the death of Ayrton Senna. Sid Watkins, the man who tried to save him, was a close friend who led two safety revolutions within Formula 1.
articles.title: Sid Watkins, Ayrton Senna and Formula 1's safety revolution

articles.description: Britain's Stuart Austin "hates fighting" but says he's the "best he's ever been" before facing Hatef Moeil for the heavyweight title at Oktagon 57.
articles.title: Oktagon 57: Stuart Austin hates fighting but is best he's been

articles.description: Jadon Sancho could return to Manchester United this summer as a Champions League winner, but his future at the club remains uncertain.
articles.title: Borussia Dortmund v PSG: Jadon Sancho's future analysed

articles.description: Bayern Munich manager Thomas Tuchel says his side will need to be brave in the second leg of their Champions League semi-final against Real Madrid.
articles.title: Bayern Munich 2-2 Real Madrid: Thomas Tuchel reacts to draw

articles.description: Saracens lock Maro Itoje will be available for the Premiership run-in after his citation for a dangerous tackle against Bath is dismissed.
articles.title: Saracens' Maro Itoje has citation for dangerous tackle dismissed

articles.description: Former captain Steve Smith is left out of Australia's squad for June's T20 World Cup.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Australia omit Steve Smith as Mitchell Marsh named captain
